snippet.title: Marvel's Avengers: Game Overview
snippet.description:
Marvel’s Avengers is a third-person action-adventure game where you play an all-new, original Avengers story reassembling Earth’s Mightiest Heroes. 

This video dives deeply into how you customize Super Heroes’ Gear, Skills, Outfits, and how to launch missions from your helicarrier base of operations to take on AIM.

#EmbraceYourPowers #Reassemble #PlayAvengers

---------
Subscribe to our channel to keep up-to-date with all things Marvel’s Avengers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0CelqHTkd3P7xgWEtB8ywQ?sub_confirmation=1

Follow us on Social:
• Facebook: https://www.Facebook.com/PlayAvengersGame
• Twitter: https://www.Twitter.com/PlayAvengers
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarvelGames
• Instagram: https://www.Instagram.com/PlayAvengers
• Website: https://PlayAvengers.com
• Website: https://www.marvel.com/
